law.catch_line: Prescriptive authority of advanced practice registered nurse.
law.text: An advanced practice registered nurse shall be considered a practitioner for purposes of KRS Chapters 217 and 218A and shall have the authority granted to a practitioner pursuant to those chapters subject to the conditions set forth in KRS 314.042.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 66, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 3, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 342, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1996.
